SageTVPlugin.Name: Phoenix Fanart for Malore Menus
SageTVPlugin.Description:
Phoenix Fanart Malore Menus v1.02 for SageTV 7. This STVi uses the phoenix API to display Fanart on the Malore Menus. The Malore menus are enabled by navigating to the System Information menu and typing "5309" (no quotes).
This is a port of "Phoenix Fanart for the Default STV" and also contains "BMT Tools" by Tiki.
SageTVPlugin.Author: tmiranda, Tiki
SageTVPlugin.STVImport: Phoenix Fanart for Malore Menus v1.02.stvi
SageTVPlugin.ReleaseNotes: Version 1.02 - Fixed packaging problem. Version 1.00 - Initial release for SageTV V7. Based on tmiranda's Phoenix Fanart for the Default STV and Tiki's BMT Tools.
